ygData.subject: RE: Value of lambent stones (was AC Dilemma)
ygData.msgSnippet: Definitely.  I offered one person auctioning one in S Ro 30pp and he laughed.  I laughed in return and said good luck in getting more.  He said his guildmates
ygData.messageBody:
Definitely. I offered one person auctioning one in S Ro 30pp and he
laughed. I laughed in return and said good luck in getting more. He said
his guildmates paid him 100pp apiece for the last two. I told him they were
crazy and that I had even seen them at merchants for 47pp. He said good
luck getting one then and camped. The very next nite I was given one by a
38th level warrior who I healed up during the GM even in Greater Faydark.
The 39th level wizard he was grouped with offered me a dirk, but since I
already had one I declined. I have found our healing ability, being
non-mana based, extremely useful for helping higher levels recover during
and after GM quest events.

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: Katy Westerman [mailto:katyw@...]
Sent: Tuesday, November 09, 1999 2:18 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Value of lambent stones (was AC Dilemma)


From: Katy Westerman <katyw@...>


I've been doing the same on E'ci...I bought one for 20 plat and have
seen them auctioned for 100+. When they laugh at my offers of 20
plat, I just tell them that if they can sell it for more to someone
else, go right ahead...I don't know who told them that they could sell
it for that much though...

--
Katy Westerman Don't lick something unless
katyw@... you really mean it.
